article_title: 2 police cruisers hit in Colorado Springs – The Denver Post
article_text:
COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. (AP) — Several Colorado Springs police officers escaped injury when a car ran into their cruisers while the officers were investigating a domestic disturbance on the side of the road.

The accident happened about 1 a.m. Saturday. The cruisers were stopped in the roadway with their emergency lights flashing.

The driver of the vehicle, 32-year-old Jason Pope, was charged with careless driving, driving while texting and DUI.
